title: Fire Sale!  Everything Must Go!
content:
The forum's freezing over! The only way to save yourself is by going to [url=http://pckf.keenmodding.org]pckf.keenmodding.org[/url]!!! (at least until we get [url=http://www.pckf.com]pckf.com[/url] pointing properly.)

There you will find a whole new message board to start fresh, and to be modified to our liking! Custom titles will be restored to those who ask! Leave now while you still can!--------------------
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/]Cerebral Cortex 314[/url] - For All of your Commander Keen Needs.
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/dave/joes.html]Eat at Joes[/url]

title: Re: Fire Sale!  Everything Must Go!
content:
Yeah, welcome everyone. This is the move you've been waiting for so you better sign up there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Fire Sale!  Everything Must Go!
content:
Flaose said: (long quote here)

???

/me runs away, frightened!

BTW, is this the last time I'll see you using administrative powers, Flaose? We'll miss you. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ------------------------------

content: See, I'd love to sign up over there, but the authorization email never came. If an admin can manually activate Sciz CT or at least resend the auth. message, that'd be great.

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Fire Sale!  Everything Must Go!

title: Re: Fire Sale!  Everything Must Go!
content:
I got rid of confirmation...if anything (which is strange), it was increasing the number of spambots. It also sent out a poorly worded, junk-mail considered e-mail.--------------------
